name: terraria-world-parser
description: Terraria world file parser in javascript

scripts.server: parcel serve --port 80 --open --out-dir src/tests/web --out-file browser-built.html --target browser --cache-dir src/tests/web/.cache src/tests/browser.html
scripts.build:example:mapgen: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build --out-dir ./examples --out-file map-rendering-in-browser.html --no-cache --target browser --no-source-maps src/tests/browser.html

author: cokolele
